# Unconscious
## Overview
Unconscious creatures are knocked out and [[Helpless|helpless]]. Unconsciousness can result from having negative hit points (but not more than the creature's Constitution score), or from nonlethal damage in excess of current hit points.

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 568
